column3: Belt and zipper were a little hard to navigate in a full day of wear/bathroom use, but that's to be expected.
column4: Wish it had pockets, but other than that-- absolutely perfect!

column2: I rented this dress for a photo shoot.
column3: The theme was Hollywood Glam and Big Beautiful Hats.
column4: The dress was very comfortable and easy to move around in.
column5: It is definitely on my list to rent again for another formal event.

column2: This hugged in all the right places!
column3: It was a perfect dress for my event and I received so many compliments on it.
column4: Not to mention customer service was great getting this to me in less than 24 hours!

column2: I rented this for my company's black tie awards banquet.
column3: I liked that this dress was short but was a little fancier with the sequins.
column4: (I generally don't care for long dresses.)
column5: I would describe the color as more rose gold than yellow gold.
column6: I have blonde hair and fair skin, and the color was very flattering.
column7: This is a very forgiving dress!
column8: It's form fitting without making you feel like you're squeezed into it.
column9: I would rent this one again.

column2: I have always been petite in my upper body and extremely athletic.
column3: I'm 5'9 and typically am a size 4,6,8 due to the fact I had a smaller upper frame and 34B cup.
column4: Depends what fabric were talking about too!
column5: However, because I have been lifting weights my back has grown (odd to add- but figured I'd say it knowing other people lift weights) My lat area is so wide that I was suffocating in a size 6.
column6: If I wasn't as muscular in my back I would've been fine.
column7: I would recommend to go up a size if you are into lifting weights and very broad in your upper body.

column4: The fabric is a little thicker, so higher quality.
column5: Felt a bit too conservative for my taste.
column6: I rented it for the color and loved the berry shade of red.

column4: The fit is loose with a tie for the waist, which means it should flatter most figures.

column3: Maybe a little tight under the arms.

column2: I was nervous of it looking cheap when it arrived but I received a ton of compliments on it and it had built in support.
column3: I am a 36D and there was still that I was able to wear a bra with it with no problem.
column4: Wore with 3-4 heels and it was perfect length.

column2: The dress was very flattering and fit perfectly through my stomach and hips.
column3: I have a booty so I always worry about how things are going to fit, but this was amazing.
column4: I have a small chest and didn't fill out the built in bra as much as I would have liked, but it still looked great and I was comfortable in it.
column5: The dress had more stretch and give than I thought it would.
column6: I was worried I wouldn't be able to enjoy dancing and while I couldn't bust out break dance moves, I was able to dance without feeling completely restricted.
column7: I am always a zero in dresses and this fit true to size.
column8: I'm short, 5'3 and I thought the length was perfect with a heel.
column9: Overall I'm very pleased with my order!!
